trans-unit.target: Karty są zazwyczaj tworzony automatycznie przez program ASP.NET i musi mieć konstruktora domyślnego.

trans-unit.target: Identyfikator źródła zdarzenia.

trans-unit.target: Argument identyfikator zdarzenia.

trans-unit.source: Collection of postback data from the request object.
trans-unit.target: Kolekcja odświeżania strony danych z obiektu żądania.

trans-unit.source: A modified version of the baseCollection parameter.
trans-unit.target: Zmodyfikowanej wersji baseCollection parametru.

trans-unit.source: Evaluates whether the device adapter set applies to the specified request.
trans-unit.target: Określa, czy zestaw adaptera urządzenia ma zastosowanie do określonego żądania.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Ten interfejs API jest przestarzały.

trans-unit.source: |Class|Returns|Preferred rendering type|Check value of JavaScript property| |-----------|-------------|------------------------------|----------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.|The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> returns `true`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.|The device capability of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> returns `false`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>.|N/A|
trans-unit.target: | Klasa | Zwraca | Preferowany typ renderowania | Sprawdź wartość właściwości JavaScript | |-----------|-------------|------------------------------|----------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>| `true`| Sprawdza, czy wartość <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A>jest <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32>lub <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>. | Zwraca <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> `true`. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter>| `true`| Sprawdza, czy <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A>jest <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32>lub <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>. | Możliwości urządzenia <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A>zwraca `false`. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter>| `true`| Sprawdza, czy <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A>jest <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11>lub <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>. | N/A|</xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the device adapter set applies to the specified request; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Jeśli karta urządzenia ustawiona ma zastosowanie do określonego żądania; w przeciwnym razie <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
